name: untitled project (zhangs)
description:
guy who didn't even know how to code (me) signs up for a game jam (scarlet game jam fall 2022) and chugs out a one-level game in a week, but thankfully can cover it up because the theme for the game jam was "cutting corners"

make things work by clicking on them so the lil guy can progress

 barely runs and can probably freeze up if you hit walls weird. play at your own discretion
